testcase.name: Order Management E2E Tests › 1. Creating a New Order › should create order with multiple items
Order Management E2E Tests › 2. Adding Items to Existing Order › should add items to existing order on occupied table
Order Management E2E Tests › 3. Modifying Order Items › should increase item quantity
Order Management E2E Tests › 3. Modifying Order Items › should decrease item quantity
Order Management E2E Tests › 3. Modifying Order Items › should remove item from cart
Order Management E2E Tests › 3. Modifying Order Items › should clear entire cart
Order Management E2E Tests › 4. Order Status Transitions › should transition order through status workflow
Order Management E2E Tests › 5. Table Order Transfer › should transfer order from one table to another
Order Management E2E Tests › 5. Table Order Transfer › should show merge warning when transferring to occupied table
Order Management E2E Tests › 6. Order Cancellation › should cancel a pending order
Order Management E2E Tests › 7. Order Payment/Checkout Flow › should complete payment with cash
Order Management E2E Tests › 7. Order Payment/Checkout Flow › should complete payment with card
Order Management E2E Tests › 7. Order Payment/Checkout Flow › should apply discount before payment
Order Management E2E Tests › 7. Order Payment/Checkout Flow › should cancel payment and return to cart
Order Management E2E Tests › Complete Order Lifecycle › should complete full order lifecycle: create -> modify -> pay
